steps.title: Open Grow Cube.
steps.content: Open Grow Cube. Go to https://www.eyezmaze.com/sp/2016/08/growCube.html in your computer's web browser, then click the Click here to enable Adobe Flash and click Allow or OK when prompted. Depending on your browser's settings, opening the Grow Cube website itself may start Grow Cube. You can also play Grow Cube on Android by downloading it from the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Select the "Person" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Person" icon. This will drop a single Person on the top of your Grow Cube. Nothing much will happen at this point. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select the "Water" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Water" icon. Water will appear on the left side of the Grow Cube, a few layers down. Your Person will dig down to reach it, and then a geyser will shoot up. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select the "Plant" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Plant" icon. It resembles three colored orbs, and is located in the bottom-left corner. Plants will appear across the top of the cube, and another Person will appear. Your two People will begin digging a river, and once it is complete the top of your Grow Cube will turn green. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select the "Pot" icon, located in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Select the "Pot" icon, located in the top-right corner. Your Plants will grow a little, and another Person will appear. Your People will begin digging out the corner of the Cube closest to you.

steps.title: Select the "Glass Tube" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Glass Tube" icon. All of your Plants will grow a little, and another Person will be created. Your People will dig a bit more and discover a cave.

steps.title: Select the "Fire" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Fire" icon. Your Pipe will extend and your Pot will get bigger. Your People will dig a little more, and one of them will light a fire under the Pot. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Select the "Bowl" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Bowl" icon. Your Pipe will expand some more, Plants will be added to the Pot, and the vines will fall over. One of your People will take a torch into the dark cave, illuminating it. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Select the "Bone" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Bone" icon. A Bone will appear at the bottom of the Cube, and the Bowl will grow into a large tower. One of your People will expand the river so that it flows into the irrigation canals that have been dug in the lower parts of the Cube. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Select either the "Spring" icon or the "Ball" icon.
steps.content: Select either the "Spring" icon or the "Ball" icon. You can select either of these options; as long as they're the only two options left, the outcome will be the same. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Select the remaining icon.
steps.content: Select the remaining icon. This will complete complete Grow Cube, thus treating you to the final "CONGRATULATIONS" scene.

steps.title: Obtain the secret endings.
steps.content: Obtain the secret endings. While these endings won't actually complete Grow Cube, you can cause funny side-effects by selecting items in the following orders: [8] X Research source Fire Tower — Choose "Fire" → "Bowl" → "Spring" → "Ball" → "Bone" → "Person" → "Plant" → "Glass Tube" → "Pot" → "Water" Round Tube — Choose "Person" → "Bone" → "Plant" → "Bowl" → "Glass Tube" → "Spring" → "Ball" → "Pot" → "Fire" → "Water"
